The downgrade is attributed to a lower revenue run rate for Playtech’s Asian business in the final weeks of 1H18. Aggressive pricing from new entrants has impacted volumes for Playtech’s games in Asia (predominately in China). The company is taking steps to remediate the situation and improve its competitive standing with its Asian customers. We understand this can include improved volume based discount terms. The timing of the revenue decline implies the majority of the impact will be in 2H18e, which management expects to be approximately €70 million. We estimate the downgrade is €100 million on an annualized basis, assuming no recovery from remediation action. We expect a similar impact on adj EBITDA, given high incremental margins for B2C gaming.

Consort believes the deal has a number of strategic merits, including a combined global manufacturing footprint (a new presence for Consort in North America and Asia), broadened product portfolios, new capabilities (prevision tool making) and cross-selling opportunities across both customer bases.

At 116p per share, we estimate this values Carclo at c.£85m. The Company generated a profit after tax of £8.5m in 2018, implying a return on investment of c.10% prior to any synergies. Given the nature of Carclo’s business and Consort’s track record of improving margin in its earlier acquisition of Aesica, we believe there would be scope to further improve this return on investment. However, we would also highlight that Consort has stated it is evaluating Carclo’s LED Technologies and Aerospace business and assessing whether it would retain or dispose of each business following any transaction, with the proceeds of any disposal being used to either repay debt or reinvest in the new combined business. As such, the return on investment would be impacted by any such disposal.

We also note the geographical expansion into North America and Asia which has been part of Consort’s communicated strategy. Consort has stated it will make further announcements as and when appropriate.
